name: GIVE Nation
slogan: Financial literacy through gamified mobile app that rewards kids for giving back!
description:
In short: GIVE is a blockchain-based ecosystem that teaches sustainable financial literacy, we onboard trusted charities, so while kids learn, earn, save, invest; they can also give, and be rewarded to do so, resulting in much needed soft skills. We are creating a huge social impact and supporting kids; while they save the world! 

Our mission for a better tomorrow has been scientifically proven as achievable through the United Nations ‚ÄòSustainable Development Goals. Brilliant and globally recognized scientists are directing the world on how to stop and prevent further damage to our planet; while GIVE Nation empowers children to become real superheroes and join them in their pursuit of saving the world!

GIVE Nation is a gamified ecosystem for children easily accessible on smart devices. Our ‚ÄúCitizens‚Äù enjoy learning and practicing sustainable financial literacy while being rewarded for philanthropistic actions!
GIVE transforms pocket money into a plethora of incredible opportunities, with the help from the partnerships of our successful educational platforms, charities and business partnerships; We teach kids to; save, invest, earn, spend wisely, and of course, to GIVE!

GIVE Empowers Kids
When GIVE Citizens complete a task improving the planet, our technology will generate a digital recognition. This shows children that giving is not only rewarding in the long term, but can also have immediate benefit. Neuroplasticity and the science of conditioning behaviors have proven, the younger we practice the art of giving, the more likely we are to continue, improving our mental and physical health. Acting together, we can all support the planet and ensure future generations continue to make a positive impact in efforts for a better future.
Partnering with GIVE
The GIVE Nation Ecosystem is launching in primary and secondary schools located in London, allowing students nationwide to participate in our fun literacy program. Apply to join our GIVE family today!

team.name: Arnaud Saint-Paul
team.bioHtml: Award Winning Conscious Technologist, Social Impact, Blockchain CEO @HealThruWords, CSO @Conscious Capitalism DC, Keynote Speaker

team.title: Product Strategy & Management
team.name: Saurabh Dayama
team.bioHtml: Digital Product Manager with 10+ years experience working in product development, IT strategy, IT consulting, Business Analysis and Project management.

jobs.title: Proven Business developer for the Give Nation
jobs.description:
Give¬†is the do-good smart money for kids, citizens of the GIVE NATION, to help them learn financial education and experience the power of¬†giving¬†at school. In the award winning¬†Give¬†ecosystem, our kids have a daily practice of saving money, investing it, earning it, spending it and¬†giving¬†to charities from 5 to 18 years old. After a successful MVP with 800 kids in Kosovo and we are now building our first government supported soft launch with 10,000 kids to scale to 1M shortly thereafter in Kosovo and the UK. We also receive the support of partners like¬†Ashoka,¬†Aviva Group, Aflatoun, Novartis, Finastra, Prince's Trust and more.

TV Interview launching Give in Kosovo:¬†https://www.facebook.com/Ora7Official/videos/348717159048350/



Looking for a business developer that would join our founding team to make partnerships with product and service providers for our kids in preparation for our Pilot and help the team create a movement in the City and at large towards youth financial literacy and giving.

S/he is dynamic and cause driven (financial literacy/youth/SDGs), has an extensive network or know how to extend quickly his own.

S/he will work with our founder.

We are currently all volunteering but actively working on fundraising. All volunteers will be offered a positioned once financed.

jobs.title: Social Media Advisor - Community Builder to empower youth
jobs.description:
Give¬†is the do-good smart money for kids, citizens of the GIVE NATION, to help them learn financial education and experience the power of¬†giving¬†at school. In the award winning¬†Give¬†ecosystem, our kids have a daily practice of saving money, investing it, earning it, spending it and¬†giving¬†to charities from 5 to 18 years old. After a successful MVP with 800 kids in Kosovo and we are now building our first government supported soft launch with 10,000 kids to scale to 1M shortly thereafter in Kosovo and the UK. We also receive the support of partners like¬†Ashoka,¬†Aviva Group, Aflatoun, Novartis, Finastra, Prince's Trust and more.

TV Interview launching Give in Kosovo:¬†https://give.si/7ora


We are currently looking for a Senior Social Media Advisor that would like to contribute by fostering our first country's community: Kosovo to create a national movement and guide kids and their community towards a more thriving and sustainable future. 
Most likely you will work with a local social media manager that will handle the ground work (in english and albanian).

Our ideal candidate(s) will like to work with remote colleagues and had previous master experiences. 

All contributors are currently volunteering to what the Give Nation is to become while we are raising the necessary funds for the pilot to be started this september. 
Once funds are gathered, existing volunteers will be offered a position.

jobs.title: Video Creation Intern
jobs.description:
Role Description
GIVE is looking for an intern that is currently studying or has recently graduated from a degree. The candidate must be organized, be able to work under pressure, and produce high quality work. The role will be working under the Community Director with a team that will be responsible for creating several professional quality videos. This will require a commitment of 5-10 hours per week, and virtual attendance on all necessary conference calls. The candidate must be able to work collaboratively and independently as this is a remote role. The candidate must familiarize themselves with the company‚Äôs needs, visions, and product to create suitable proposals to benefit the organization. 

Responsibilities
Familiarize themselves with the company and all its aspects ‚Äì this is essential to create high quality content
Generate video, graphical, and audio content in a persuasive and professional manner. 
Liaise with team members and supervisor on a regular basis
Attend necessary conference calls
Identifies and resolve problems in a timely manner and develop alternate solutions. 
Meet all project deadlines. 

Required Skills
Currently studying or completed a relevant degree
Experience creating videos, animations, or graphics
Excellent spoken and written communications skills. 
Pay high attention to detail.
Possess and maintain a professional attitude. 
Have a resilient mindset and be able to adapt to a start-up environment.
Able to work independently. 
Have access to a stable Wi-Fi and a laptop/desktop
Punctual with deadlines. 

Additional Information:
Start date: ASAP
Working hours: 5-10 hours/week, remote
Benefits: Candidate will receive reference letters upon successful completion of the internship.

jobs.title: Magazine Editor/ Content Provider
jobs.description:
Role Description
GIVE is looking for talented Content Writers who will expand our digital footprint and drive more value through content. GIVE‚Äôs environment is a philanthropic start-up. We are currently launching our mobile application. The technology you‚Äôll be writing about is new, interactive, and will change the planet for the better! The perfect candidate will be highly creative, original, authentic, compassionate, and reliable. The duration of the internship will vary from 3 to 6 months, specifics discussed upon selection. Not only will this candidate gain a substantial amount of experience, they will spearhead the content we use to successfully market GIVE Nation and writer will have access to endless future opportunities. The founders of GIVE Nation have previous successful tech startups, a collective following of 5 Million followers, many different publishing outlets/opportunities, and impressive educational, government and STEM relationships; our intern will be highly rewarded for work, with possible intent to hire after internship.  

Responsibilities
- Produce content for dissemination via website, magazine, press releases, blogs, newsletters, and social media.
- Work next to founders and liaising with other members to complete projects.
- Write clear content to promote GIVE‚Äôs services and products.
- Prepare well-structured drafts.
- Collaborate with other departments to create innovative content ideas.
- Reports to Communications Director. 


Required Skills
- Writing. Excellent ‚Äúpen‚Äù, proofreading and editing skills.
- Proficient. Creating original, creative and wholesome content.
- Transparent. Honesty and good communication skills are a must.
- Altruistic. GIVE‚Äôs vision to be conveyed in content via a humanitarian and positive writing style.
- Punctuality. Ability to meet agreed upon deadlines.
-Motivated. Works independently in a fast paced environment. 
-Helpful. STEM, Crypto or Blockchain experience preferred, but not required for all writers.

Additional Information
Start date: ASAP
Working hours: Varies based on your desires & talents
Compensation: Intent to hire
Duration of the internship: 3-6 months
Office Location: Remote
Casual Weekly Meetings: Thursday‚Äôs at 1100CST Via Google Hangouts

What is GIVE Nation?
GIVE Nation encourages an altruistic culture in young minds by improving the planet through promoting transparent acts of kindness. Future generations achieve happiness and sustainable financial well-being through a real-world, easily accessible mobile app. Our ecosystem provides children real-time use of digital currencies by means of blockchain and A.I. technology, all while rewarding them for meeting goals and giving back. GIVE Nation is a world for kids by kids.

Though gamification in a safe environment, creativity is unleashed and more potential avenues of earning coins will be established by GIVE kids, empowering entrepreneurship, creativity and fast decision making.

Allowing kids to own and manage their GIVE tokens empowers them to make the choice to invest early on. Additionally, underprivileged kids with less purchasing power can earn their coins through inventing new services or products provided to other kids, or through volunteering to charities. This levels the playing field enabling children with less resources to purchase what they need.


Please send; 
*Pro Bio/headshot
*LinkedIn (Updated)
*Medium (No Medium? Make an account and also link us to 3 writing examples, please) 

Arnaud Saint-Paul; Arnaud@GIVE.si 
Alyze Sam; Alyze@GIVENation.World    

Or visit us on GIVE‚Äôs telegram and start a conversation now!  
Telegram: https://t.me/GiveFoundation 

Help GIVE foster generosity and sustainable financial literacy in kids by joining our #GiveNation revolution on social media!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheGiveNation
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheGiveNation
Medium: https://medium.com/TheGiveNation
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClz9RI3oIN8mHYTVi22W3ow
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/GiveFoundation
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/TheGiveNation
Telegram: https://t.me/GiveFoundation 
Website: GIVENation.World
